<a id="EditorScenePostImportPlugin"></a>

# EditorScenePostImportPlugin

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Plugin to control and modifying the process of importing a scene.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This plugin type exists to modify the process of importing scenes, allowing to change the content as well as add importer options at every stage of the process.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__get_import_options"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_get_import_options**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__get_import_options)

Override to add general import options. These will appear in the main import dock on the editor. Add options via [add_import_option()](EditorScenePostImportPlugin.md#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_method_add_import_option) and [add_import_option_advanced()](EditorScenePostImportPlugin.md#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_method_add_import_option_advanced).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__get_internal_import_options"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_get_internal_import_options**\ (\ category\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__get_internal_import_options)

Override to add internal import options. These will appear in the 3D scene import dialog. Add options via [add_import_option()](EditorScenePostImportPlugin.md#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_method_add_import_option) and [add_import_option_advanced()](EditorScenePostImportPlugin.md#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_method_add_import_option_advanced).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__get_internal_option_update_view_required"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](Variant.md) **_get_internal_option_update_view_required**\ (\ category\: [int](int.md), option\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__get_internal_option_update_view_required)

Should return ``true`` if the 3D view of the import dialog needs to update when changing the given option.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__get_internal_option_visibility"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](Variant.md) **_get_internal_option_visibility**\ (\ category\: [int](int.md), for_animation\: [bool](bool.md), option\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__get_internal_option_visibility)

Should return ``true`` to show the given option, ``false`` to hide the given option, or ``null`` to ignore.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__get_option_visibility"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](Variant.md) **_get_option_visibility**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md), for_animation\: [bool](bool.md), option\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__get_option_visibility)

Should return ``true`` to show the given option, ``false`` to hide the given option, or ``null`` to ignore.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__internal_process"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_internal_process**\ (\ category\: [int](int.md), base_node\: [Node](Node.md), node\: [Node](Node.md), resource\: [Resource](Resource.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__internal_process)

Process a specific node or resource for a given category.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__post_process"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_post_process**\ (\ scene\: [Node](Node.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__post_process)

Post-process the scene. This function is called after the final scene has been configured.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__pre_process"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_pre_process**\ (\ scene\: [Node](Node.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__pre_process)

Pre-process the scene. This function is called right after the scene format loader loaded the scene and no changes have been made.

Pre-process may be used to adjust internal import options in the ``"nodes"``, ``"meshes"``, ``"animations"`` or ``"materials"`` keys inside ``get_option_value("_subresources")``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorScenePostImportPlugin_method_add_import_option"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_import_option**\ (\ name\: [String](String.md), value\: [Variant](Variant.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_method_add_import_option)

Add a specific import option (name and default value only). This function can only be called from [_get_import_options()](EditorScenePostImportPlugin.md#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__get_import_options) and [_get_internal_import_options()](EditorScenePostImportPlugin.md#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__get_internal_import_options).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorScenePostImportPlugin_method_add_import_option_advanced"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_import_option_advanced**\ (\ type\: [Variant.Type](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Variant.Type), name\: [String](String.md), default_value\: [Variant](Variant.md), hint\: [PropertyHint](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_PropertyHint) = 0, hint_string\: [String](String.md) = "", usage_flags\: [int](int.md) = 6\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_method_add_import_option_advanced)

Add a specific import option. This function can only be called from [_get_import_options()](EditorScenePostImportPlugin.md#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__get_import_options) and [_get_internal_import_options()](EditorScenePostImportPlugin.md#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_private_method__get_internal_import_options).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorScenePostImportPlugin_method_get_option_value"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](Variant.md) **get_option_value**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorScenePostImportPlugin_method_get_option_value)

Query the value of an option. This function can only be called from those querying visibility, or processing.
